segments.text: Is there any more vodka in that bottle ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hum , I think there's enough for one more , yes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Marvelous . Pass it over . My name's George , by the way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you , George . I'm Irene .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So Irene , what do you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm in computing . I work for Macrohard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have my own company that designs computer systems .
segments.speaker: S1
